item.title: There are no dumb questions
item.description: There are no dumb questions, only dumb answers Above is something I always repeat when someone starts a question with “This is probably a dumb question, but…”. The thought process behind it makes total sense: either a person doesn’t want to waste the time of other people on the team or doesn’t want to look silly, so they start with a nice cushion to fall back on in case somebody answers in a condescending manner.
